text: Harvey Bartle III (born June 6, 1941) is an American lawyer, judge and Republican politician. He was the 39th Attorney General of Pennsylvania from 1980 to 1981. He was also the Chief Judge of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania from 2006 to 2011. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Pennsylvania attorneys general Category:Lawyers from Philadelphia Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:People from Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Harvey Bartle III
